## Ilse Dippenaar and Sam Gilbert
https://www.kaggle.com/fivethirtyeight/2016-election-polls

```{r}
d <- read.csv("presidential_polls.csv")
d <- subset(d, type=="polls-only")
exclude <- c("cycle", "branch", "type", "matchup", "forecastdate", "multiversions", "timestamp", "rawpoll_mcmullin", "adjpoll_mcmullin")
d <- d[,!(names(d)  %in% exclude)]

outcomes <- read.csv("outcomes.csv")
sapply(names(d), function(n) length(unique(d[[n]])))
```

```{r}
View(d)
```
